members.name: dispenseRequestNumberofRepeatsAllowed

constantValues: Dispense Request Number of Repeats Allowed
An integer indicating the number of times, in addition to the original dispense, (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication.

members.displayName: Dispense Request Number of Repeats Allowed
members.description: An integer indicating the number of times, in addition to the original dispense, (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication.

members.name: groupIdentifier

members.description: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition or prescription.
